Package com.project.dao.files

Class FilesDaoInMemory

java.lang.Object
com.project.dao.files.FilesDaoInMemory
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudDao<File>, FilesDao
@Component("FilesDaoInMemory") public class FilesDaoInMemory extends Object implements FilesDao
Class for working with storage of files in memory that implements the FilesDao interface
